H1.text: who do islamic people follow. Gabriel

H2.text: who do islamic people follow. Abraham

H3.text: who do islamic people follow. Allah

A4.text: In Islam, Muhammad (Arabic: مُحَمَّد) is venerated as the Seal of the Prophets who transmitted the eternal word of God (Qur'ān) from the angel Gabriel (Jibrīl) to humans and jinn.

A5.text: The religious, social, and political tenets that Muhammad established with the Quran became the foundation of Islam and the Muslim world.

A6.text: The Concept of Allāh According to the Qur'an by Abdul Mannan Omar

A7.text: Allah, the Unique Name of God
